comment.text: Hi Jess. You'll probably wondering why the Yelp app is looking rather strange...Swipe left to see why :P
Ever since I met you, you've brought nothing but joy and excitement in my life.
You are such an encouraging, compassionate, challenging, intelligent, and God-loving woman...
And you know how to bring a smile to my face everyday (especially the days when you buy me donuts :P).
I know at times we may frustrate or misunderstand each other because of our differences.
And we may not feel as joyful as we could be with each other.
But I know that just as Jesus graciously loves us, I will always love you.
And I will always support you during your highs and lows.
There's no one else I'd rather spend the rest of my life with than with you. So Jessica Yen...
